name: KURO KNIGHT #20
description:
When an alien virus infected the world humans and machines bonded. We escaped into the virtual world to fight for our existence. This is new URTH an original series featuring an array of original characters.

KURO KNIGHT is the hordes answer to their enemies mech. A huge robot filled with rage and built to oppress.


By holding a character in this series you are eligible for secret airdrops. Collect and hold all of the characters for the chance to receive the comic when it is available. Copyright @smileghostnf
Follow me on Twitter @smileghostnft and check out the website at www.smileghost.com
